that was the name preferred from the 80's....for the first 20 years or so, it was west and east malaysia....and to many people in borneo, it's still known as malaya, especially the chinese educated....my point remains....the country of malaysia, as stated in the original constitution, is made up of the separate and distinct territories of the federation of malaya, north borneo (renamed sabah) and sarawak, with singapore removed from the list in 1965...
